name: Portal 2.5: From the Wheat Field
description:
Portal 2.5 is a fan game for Valve's video game, Portal 2. The game starts where Portal 2 ended, so you should finish playing Portal 2 before playing this, to avoid spoilers. The story explores some theories about the characters. This has some puzzles and interactive choices, by it's mainly linear. It's meant to be taken more as an interactive piece of fan fiction rather than a game.

Praise for Portal 2.5

This reminds me so much of those old RPGs I loved so much as a kid! ... I just bought a last generation game and yet I had more fun playing this for a whole hour and a half ... nicely done.
